programme.long_synopsis:
Roy Plomley's castaway is the former Musical Director of the Royal Marines Sir Vivian Dunn.

Favourite track: Praise To The Holiest In The Height by Edward Elgar
Book: Autobiography by Sir Winston Churchill
Luxury: Piano, manuscript paper, pencils and a rubber
